Package kivaworld

The KivaWorld specific Java libraries included in KivaWorld-1.0.jar

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FloorMap
    FloorMap represents Kiva's environment, including pod pickup/dropoff points, obstacles, and Kiva's starting location.
    KeyboardResource
    A simple text scanner that takes keyboard input from a user.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FacingDirection
    Enumeration describing which way a robot is facing, containing the delta required to transform the location in that direction when moving forward.
    FloorMapObject
    Objects that can exist in Kiva's world: empty squares, obstacles, pods, dropzones.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalDropZoneException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to drop a pod on a location that isn't a drop zone.
    IllegalMoveException
    Thrown when an attempt is made to have Kiva move in an illegal direction (e.g.
    InvalidFloorMapLocationException
    Thrown when a request is made to get an object located off the current FloorMap.
    InvalidKivaCommandException
    Thrown when an invalid command key (that doesn't correspond to a valid KivaCommand) is received.
    InvalidMapLayoutException
    Thrown when an invalid map is given (e.g.
    NoPodException
    Thrown if an attempt is made to pick up a pod that doesn't exist.

Package kivaworld Description
